com.googlecode.gmail4j.rss
Class RssGmailMessage

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.gmail4j.GmailMessage
      com.googlecode.gmail4j.rss.RssGmailMessage

public class RssGmailMessage
extends GmailMessage

Read-only GmailMessage implementation procuded by RssGmailClient.

This implementation is based on ROME SyndEntry.

Example use: 

     GmailClient rssGmailClient = new RssGmailClient();
     //configure the client...
     for (GmailMessage message : rssGmailClient.getUnreadMessages()) {
         System.out.println(message.getFrom());
         System.out.println(message.getSendDate());
         System.out.println(message.getSubject());
         System.out.println(message.getPreview());
         System.out.println(message.getLink());
     }

0.1
